Recipe: Cold pasta salad

Ingredients:
- Brown pasta, 100g
- Spinach, 30g
- Corn kernels, 50g 
- Sliced tomato, 40g
- Sliced onion, 30g
- Balsamic vinegar, 1 tbsp
- Olive oil, 2 tbsp

Instructions: Boil your pasta in a small pot for 8-12 minutes. Rince your cooked pasta under cold water and add it into a large bowl. Prepare on the side your other ingredients and add them into the bowl. Add Balsamic vinegar, olive oil and mix thoroughly.

Total calories: 680
